definition: the higher of two berths, higher in place or position
details:
noun
- the higher of two berths
= synonyms: upper berth
- a central nervous system stimulant that increases energy and decreases appetite
= synonyms: speed
- piece of leather or synthetic material that forms the part of a shoe or boot above the sole that encases the foot
adjective
- higher in place or position
= example: higher in place or position
- superior in rank or accomplishment
= example: superior in rank or accomplishment
- the topmost one of two
